mapper.select: select * from Businessplana a JOIN Businessplanb b on A.Seq = B.Seq JOIN Businessplanc c on A.Seq = C.Seq JOIN Businesspland d on A.Seq = D.Seq where a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Businessplana(SEQ, BUSINESS_A, BUSINESS_B, BUSINESS_C, ID, COLLECTION) VALUES(business_seq.nextval, #{business_a}, #{business_b}, #{business_c}, 'test', 'test')
